stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the solution to the differential equation  d y d x = 2 y 2 x + 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@439A@ with the initial condition y ( 0 ) = e MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E6B@  for x > âˆ’ 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DD2@ ?
